title: Espírito Santo (João Gomes do)
body: He was born in the parish of São Gonçalo in this municipality and died in the city of Porto on December 16, 1839, at the age of about eighty. He was a distinguished artillery officer and for several years commanded the artillery quartered at the São Tiago fortress. He was a man of upright character and distinguished himself as a journalist, having been the editor of a political newspaper published in Funchal, which enjoyed great renown at the time. (He collaborated in many periodicals on the mainland, having been away from journalistic activities for many years.

1839: João Gomes do Espírito Santo died in the city of Porto
